name: UIToolTipInteractionDelegate
desc: An interface that provides tooltip settings to an interaction.

items.name: func toolTipInteraction(UIToolTipInteraction, configurationAt: CGPoint) -> UIToolTipConfiguration?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for a tooltip configuration that describes the tooltip settings.

items.name: class UIToolTipConfiguration
items.desc: An object that a tooltip interaction delegate uses to describe the tooltip settings.
